name: Isaac Jacob
description:
am Isaac Jacob, am fron Ny am 49years i work in a residential and commercial construction my wife died in an auto car accident left with me a son called Dennis he is all that i have and he is 7 will be 8 soon,I am very romantic and I like to pay a lot of attention to my woman…. I also like to give her compliments and tell her how nice looking she is and how much I love and care for her.. It is not unusual for me to do nice things and buy presents for my woman. I am a very good communicator and I love to talk things over.. I hate to argue, and I am a very honest and caring man.
I would like for my future woman to be able to work along with me so that we can set goals and achieve them, and so we may have a very good life together and do things as well as have things to make both of our lives together much better.. Fidelity and Honesty are tops on my list of what I expect from my partner.. I like to laugh and have fun. Sometimes I can be very silly as to make my woman smile or laugh. I have been know to be a nut (clown) from time to time just to lighten things up, but I do have my serious side.
